laboratory_examinations.findings: Abnormal F-18 FDG hypermetabolism (SUV max/H110056.53) in the right wall of the infrarenal abdominal aorta and periaortic space, indicating active vascular infection.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased F-18 FDG uptake (SUV max/H110053.61) in the right wall of the infrarenal abdominal aorta and periaortic space one month after treatment, correlating with clinical improvement and normalization of laboratory findings. Nearly normalization of F-18 FDG uptake was observed one year after discharge.
